titleStmt.title: The baronets buriall, or A funerall sermon preached at the solemnitie of that honourable baronet Sr Edvvard Seymours buriall. By Barnaby Potter Bachelor in Divinitie, fellow of Queenes College in Oxford, and preacher to the towne of Tottnes in Devon
titleStmt.author: Potter, Barnaby, 1577-1642.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
